lines.gurmukhi: jYsy bnq bicqR ABrn isMgwr sij Bytq Bqwr icq ibml AnMd hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Banat Bachitr Abharan Singaar Saji , Bhaytat Bhataar Chit Bimal Anand Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a wife embellished with many form of ornaments feel happy meeting her husband with all the love in her heart,

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy sruvr pirPulq kml dl mDukr mudq mgn mkrMd hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Saruvar Paridhulat Kamal Dala , Madhoukar Mudat Magan Makarand Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a bumble bee feels satiated drinking the elixir from the lotus flower.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy icq cwhq ckor dyK iDAwn DrY AMmiRq ikrn Acvq ihq cMd hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Chit Chaahat Chakor Daykh Dhiaan Dharai , Anmrit Kiran Achavat Hit Chand Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as Ruddy sheldrake looks at the moon with rapt attention and drinks its ambrosial rays with his heart and mind;

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gwXbo sunwXbo susbd sMgq mYN mwno dwn kurKyqR pwp mUl kMd hY ]560]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Gaayabo Sounaayabo Sousabad Sangat Main , Maano Daan Kurakhaytr Paap Mool Kand Hai ?560?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, reciting and singing the supreme hymns/words of the True Guru in a congregation assembled in the presence of the True Guru is capable of destroying sins from the roots-just as it is believed that charity made in Kurukshetra destroys all the sin
